tool_description: Identify and inspect files that contain images, video and audio.
name: Media Inspector
title: Media Inspector

api_list.name: Inspect
api_list.description: Inspects provided URL to identify media file. If a media file is identified, the media file's metadata as resolution, bit rate and duration will be returned.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://media-inspector.p.rapidapi.com/inspect"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "media-inspector.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://media-inspector.p.rapidapi.com/inspect"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "media-inspector.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
